obs: reported for habitats, found each values from their relative range (as uunits are different in Sterling's compilation and the original study)

transects were perpendicular from beach. assuming that depth increases very gradually between the three habitats. near beach was assumed to be 1m and the ridge was assumed to be 3.3 m based on the maximum tidal range of Enewetok (1.3m in summer when the study was done). mid-reef was just the average between the two
cannot confidently assign each to a depth, so using the average of treatments (2m and 8m)
roughly from Fig1, zone depths are 1 = 11m; 2,3 and 4: 1m; 5 = 1.75m; 6=12m; 7=2m; 8=10m
